headline: PTC stock soars as Autodesk weighs takeover bid
summary: Investing.com -- PTC Inc. (NASDAQ:PTC) stock soared 9% while Autodesk Inc . (NASDAQ:ADSK) shares fell 2% after Bloomberg reported that Autodesk is considering acquiring the rival engineering-software provider.

headline: PTC to Announce Fiscal Q3'25 Results on Wednesday, July 30th, 2025
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) will release its fiscal 2025 third quarter results on Wednesday, July 30th after the stock market closes. Senior management will host a live webcast and conference call to review the results on Wednesday, July 30th at 5pm Eastern Time. The earnings press release, accompanying earnings presentation, and financial data tables will be accessible prior to the conference call and webcast on the Investor Relations section of the Company's website at PTC Investor Relations.
